verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>. Sing <WH7891> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892>, and his praise <WH8416> in the congregation <WH6951> of saints <WH2623>.
Let Yisra'EL <WH3478> rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> in him that made <WH6213> <WH8802> him: let the children <WH1121> of TZiyon <WH6726> be joyful <WH1523> <WH8799> in their King <WH4428>.
Let them praise <WH1984> <WH8762> his name <WH8034> in the dance <WH4234>: let them sing praises <WH2167> <WH8762> unto him with the timbrel <WH8596> and harp <WH3658>.
For the YY <WH3068> taketh pleasure <WH7521> <WH8802> in his people <WH5971>: he will beautify <WH6286> <WH8762> the meek <WH6035> with salvation <WH3444>.
Let the saints <WH2623> be joyful <WH5937> <WH8799> in glory <WH3519>: let them sing aloud <WH7442> <WH8762> upon their beds <WH4904>.
Let the high <WH7319> praises of 'Elohim <WH410> be in their mouth <WH1627>, and a twoedged <WH6374> sword <WH2719> in their hand <WH3027>;
To execute <WH6213> <WH8800> vengeance <WH5360> upon the heathen <WH1471>, and punishments <WH8433> upon the people <WH3816>;
To bind <WH631> <WH8800> their kings <WH4428> with chains <WH2131>, and their nobles <WH3513> <WH8737> with fetters <WH3525> of iron <WH1270>;
To execute <WH6213> <WH8800> upon them the judgment <WH4941> written <WH3789> <WH8803>: this honour <WH1926> have all his saints <WH2623>. Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>.
